snippet: Replacing several directors responsible for H.P.’s past missteps would bring some accountability to the board and ensure an uncomfortable breakup of the company is not pushed aside, the writer contends.
abstract: Replacing several directors responsible for H.P.’s past missteps would bring some accountability to the board and ensure an uncomfortable breakup of the company is not pushed aside, the writer contends.

headline.main: The Case for Shaking Up Hewlett's Board
